problem: Analyze whether AI interview prep tools are a good startup idea in South Asia

subtasks.task: Research the current market demand for interview prep tools in South Asia
subtasks.expected_output: A report on the current market size, growth potential, and trends in the interview prep tools market in South Asia

subtasks.task: Analyze the competitive landscape of AI-powered interview prep tools in South Asia
subtasks.expected_output: A competitive landscape map highlighting key players, their strengths, weaknesses, and market share

subtasks.task: Validate the effectiveness of AI interview prep tools in improving interview outcomes
subtasks.expected_output: A data-driven report on the efficacy of AI interview prep tools in enhancing interview performance and outcomes

subtasks.task: Assess the technical and infrastructure requirements for developing and deploying AI interview prep tools in South Asia
subtasks.expected_output: A technical feasibility report outlining the infrastructure, personnel, and budget requirements for developing and deploying AI interview prep tools

subtasks.task: Evaluate the potential return on investment (ROI) and financial viability of an AI interview prep tool startup in South Asia
subtasks.expected_output: A comprehensive financial analysis report including projected revenue, expenses, and ROI for an AI interview prep tool startup

rationale: This breakdown is chosen because it covers the key aspects of evaluating a startup idea, including market demand, competitive landscape, technical feasibility, financial viability, and effectiveness. Each subtask is specific, actionable, and assigned to the appropriate agent, ensuring a comprehensive and data-driven analysis of the problem.
